bioghist.p: David Wedderburn was born on 30 March 1775. He was the M.P. for the constituency known as Perth Burghs, and was also Postmaster-General for Scotland. He was created a Baronet of the United Kingdom on 10 August 1803. Sir David Wedderburn died on 7 April 1858.

scopecontent.p: The manuscript letters are to J. Smyth, about a law-suit.
